cohort.reelThemIn: “It is a capital mistake to theorize before one has data.” ― Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, Sherlock Holmes
cohort.bio: My experience in the field of social science has cultivated a deep interest in understanding and using data. Taking the course on data science has enhanced my analytical skills. Now, as an aspiring data scientist, I am keen to discover and implement the best new practices to solve problems using data.

I’ve always been good with numbers, but I fell in love with science and academic research. Confronted with the reality of academia, I turned my back on academia and returned to business. Regrettably, business lacked the excitement of the scientific process. Going to my first business meetup, I found myself among data analysts and data scientists and I suddenly realized how I can combine my passion for the scientific process and my business experience. Today I want to help businesses grow by applying data science!

cohort.reelThemIn: "If we have data, let's look at data. If all we have are opinions, let's go with mine." - Jim Barksdale
cohort.bio: I am a Nashville native and versatile analyst that is enthusiastic about working with large amounts of data to deliver insights for action-oriented solutions to complex biological, social, political, and economic challenges.
“Do not allow your mind to be imprisoned by majority thinking.” - Patricia Bath

cohort.reelThemIn: “I have always believed, and I still believe, that whatever good or bad fortune may come our way we can always give it meaning and transform it into something of value.”-Hermann Hesse
cohort.bio: I try to make the most out of every situation

cohort.reelThemIn: "Data is the new science, Big Data holds the answers" - Pat Gelsinger
cohort.bio: A Statistician + Data Scientist with statistics background and real world project expreriences in data science.

cohort.reelThemIn: Never met a data problem I didn't like.
“Torture the data, and it will confess to anything.” – Ronald Coase
cohort.bio: Ex Marine and a great story teller through data

cohort.reelThemIn: Quantum Data Scientist * Vast Experience * Endless Curiosity
cohort.bio: As a retired Military Intelligence Officer, Decision Systems Consultant and emergent Data Scientist, I help organizations harness the knowable -- that isn't yet known.

After years of training and working as a microbiologist, including a PhD from Vanderbilt University, I have learned how to approach a problem critically and develop an approach to solve it. I am excited to take these analytical and problem solving skills and apply them to data science. I love learning new methods and techniques to explore, clean, and gain insights from data in a way that brings actionable results with real value for the end client.

My experience in biomedical research, business development and clinical trials revolved around one aspect: “data” that provided knowledge. I pursued data science to learn tools to turn vast amounts of data into insights that will facilitate business decisions.

As a software developer for more than 10 years, I quickly adept to new technologies and develop software applications. I throughly enjoy fetching information from various sources and analyze it for better understanding about how the business performs. With data science skills acquired, I would like to take it to next level by building AI tools that automate certain processes within the company.

cohort.reelThemIn: Analyst, Web Scraping, Junior Data Scientist
cohort.bio: I am passionate about building actionable data science projects.

cohort.reelThemIn: Keep a loss function in mind and update the weights periodically to approach the ground truth.
cohort.bio: For nearly three year, I have worked as a marketer and came to realize how data analysis can help organizations make profits with less cost. After completion of the master's degree in data analytics, I enrolled into NSS and was eager to continue to hone not only my machine learning techniques but my experience in tackling real world data questions and analysis.
